name: Rhythm Rink
description:
WHOOSH! He comes dashing into the room– those are the most stylish skates you've ever seen! Who is he? The crowd watches in awe. He is here to skate!

Help him become the best skater around, through the power of rhythm!

Rhythm Rink is a game about skating in circles (rounded rectangles?), doing tricks, and impressing a very low-fi crowd.

Use the Z and X keys to accelerate yourself forward. Wow!

Once you're going super fast, press C on beat to perform tricks.

If you stay on beat, your tricks will become more complex and impressive!


Now go stun everyone with your dazzling skating skills.


Made for Ludum Dare 37 so its not very good but have fun!! All sounds made on an OP-1. Theme is "one room"


LDJAM link: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...
